About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Hi. My name is Rob And I like to think of myself as a movement could be my ego talking now but I’m the entire legion a culture being born, one consciousness shared I’m the cruise abeg . There aren’t any limits so I never hear stop but for now I’ll just drop this poem with you it is special to me and someday I’ll tell why I’m grateful you listened Thank you. My favorite color is red and I’m hoping that might be yours too.

Poet

Hi. My name is Rob and I love to think of myself as a poet maybe because my soul loves to tell stories but my hands remain too lazy to write so much . Nevertheless I pride in all the art I can create I dance in the glory of my several masterpieces longer and harder than bare chested Ohafia men with three skulls sitting on their heads literally with way so much vigor and better finesse.

Spoken Word Act

Just like you I have big dreams and goals, I deserve love, peace, happiness I absorb all the care and attention I can get But hey, there are fears still Well let’s just say I probably wouldn’t be here right now in this moment If I ever got completely seduced by thoughts of giving in and giving up.

Craetive Journalist

I consciously work towards being a good human; to give love selflessly and show kindness to everyone regardless because I’ve learnt pain isn’t engraved on anyone’s forehead and It’s literally impossible to know who’s really not hurting “The prettiest smiles hide the deepest secrets. The prettiest eyes have cried the most tears, and the kindest hearts have felt the most pain”.
